description:
When Tessa, Sousuke, and Kaname head to the hot springs, Kurz undertakes a special mission: peeking into the girls’ bath. Luckily, Sagara has already planned for this and planted a trap.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Goddess Comes to Japan (Part 2: The Hot Spring)
L`arrivo in Giappone della dea (capitolo delle terme)
Uma Deusa Chega Ao Japão! (Parte a: As Termas!)
Une déesse arrive au Japon (partie 2) : Les sources chaudes
